alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Susana Mountains; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 1:56AM PST until January 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Monica and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Susana Mountains; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
